title: Write a TV News Script
description: A broadcast journalist needs to write a 90-second script for the evening news about a city council meeting.

tasks.description: Review the video footage and notes from the meeting to find the most important or dramatic moment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The key soundbite and event are identified.

tasks.description: Write a script in a standard two-column format (video cues on the left, audio/narration on the right).
tasks.expected_outcome: A properly formatted broadcast script is created.

tasks.description: Time the script by reading it aloud to ensure it fits within the 90-second slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: The script is confirmed to be the correct length.
